modName: Nordic Carved Light Armor - Dragonborn edition
summary:
Nordic Carved Light Armor - Dragonborn edition
for females and males human and beast races
(also as textur replacer of the normal heavy armor)
requires Dragonborn
descriptionHtml:
[size=+3]Nordic Carved Light Armor - Dragonborn edition[/size] 
for females and males human and beast races

requires Dragonborn

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VrHiifG.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RPTlsyz.jpg[/IMG]

New light armor based on the heavy nordic carved armor.

includes:
cuiras,gloves,boots,helmet and a shield

with new 2k HD textures in hammered metal ornaments look
 
Status
is a little bit better then Dragonscale

it requires the dragonarmor perk to forge

and can be made only at the skyforge.

but after that it is cratable on every forge.


I also place a retexture file for download
so people that don´t like light armors 
can now download it as a texture replacer for the normal nordic carved armor.

Install with NMM or copy and paste files in the right folder

Please endorse if you like it
and don´t forget to upload your pictures :-)

have fun.

LOG
20 Feb.2013
Add an optional file by request 
dragon skin instead of chainmail for the male characters.
First install main mod file
then install the optional file dragonskin and overwhrite files


please check also my other mods i made
